Service Details: - Encourages a love of music in the communities through performances - Organizes the teaching and singing of four-part harmony, A Cappella style - Actively supports charitable organizations and outreach programs - Performs at seniors residential complexes
Eligibility: Ages: 15 year(s) and upLove to sing and would like to improve singing capability
How to Apply: Call or drop by a rehearsal any Monday evening at the Rutland Activity Centre
Cost: - New guests are free, otherwise $20 per month for local dues - Please ask about International and District affiliations and options/memberships
